events.message: Customer reported a rear-end collision involving their car at a traffic light intersection around 7 PM yesterday.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to vehicle damage sustained from the collision.
An agent from the auto claims department was assigned promptly to assist the customer with their vehicle accident claim.
Customer received confirmation that their claim has been acknowledged and is being processed for further investigation.
Request sent to customer for submission of police report, vehicle repair estimate, and photos of the accident scene.
Customer has submitted all requested documentation including the police report and detailed repair estimates.
Internal investigation commenced to verify circumstances of the auto accident and evaluate the extent of vehicle damage.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident details and validating the repair cost estimates submitted by customer.
Based on the investigation, a fair settlement amount was proposed to the customer covering all repair costs and additional expenses.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and the clear communication received throughout the claim process.
The claim has been approved officially by the claims department following customer acceptance of the settlement.
Payment for the approved claim was issued today directly to the customerâ€™s bank account for vehicle repairs.
The claim file has been officially closed following the issuance of payment and confirmation from the customer.
